languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer parries an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals damage, the wearer performs Kick to push the enemy away.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

languages.text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，都会立刻进行反击。 如果此次攻击造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，则装备者会使用疾速猛踢将敌人踢开{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者招架攻击时，都会立刻进行反击。 如果此次攻击造成伤害，则装备者会使用疾速猛踢将敌人踢开。

languages.text: Парировав атаку, персонаж немедленно наносит удар атакующему. Если при этом атакующий получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, персонаж может совершить Удар ногой, чтобы {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}оттолкнуть{/g} этого противника назад.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

traits.locale_text: Парировав атаку, персонаж немедленно наносит удар атакующему. Если при этом атакующий получает урон, персонаж может совершить Удар ногой, чтобы отбросить этого противника назад.
Парировав атаку, персонаж немедленно наносит удар атакующему. Если при этом атакующий получает урон, персонаж может совершить Удар ногой, чтобы отбросить этого противника назад.

languages.text: 使用者が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}たびに、直ちに攻撃者に向かって反撃する。 この攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えると、使用者はキックして敵を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が攻撃を受け流すたびに、直ちに攻撃者に向かって反撃する。 この攻撃でダメージを与えると、使用者はキックして敵を突き飛ばす。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} un ataque, contraataca inmediatamente al atacante. Si este ataque causa {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, el portador usa Patada para {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujar{/g} al enemigo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador pare un ataque, contraataca inmediatamente al atacante. Si este ataque causa daño, el portador usa Patada para empujar al enemigo.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, schlägt er sofort gegen den Angreifer zurück. Wenn dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht, führt der Träger einen Tritt aus, um den Feind {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}wegzustoßen{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger einen Angriff pariert, schlägt er sofort gegen den Angreifer zurück. Wenn dieser Angriff Schaden verursacht, führt der Träger Tritt aus, um den Feind wegzustoßen.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une attaque, il riposte immédiatement contre l'attaquant. Si cette attaque inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, l'utilisateur exécute un Coup de pied pour {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousser{/g} l'ennemi.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur pare une attaque, il riposte immédiatement contre l'attaquant. Si cette attaque inflige des dégâts, l'utilisateur exécute Coup de Pied pour repousser l'ennemi.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur pare une attaque, il riposte immédiatement contre l'attaquant. Si cette attaque inflige des dégâts, l'utilisateur exécute Coup de Pied pour repousser l'ennemi.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, bir saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturduğunda{/g} saldırgana anında geri saldırır. Bu saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirse giyen kişi, Tekme savurarak düşmanı uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.
